subject: Hockey, Ice
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: While N.H.L. teams take a break, some of their affiliates will play in the parent arenas, offering players a taste of the big time and fans a chance to see young talent.
snippet: While N.H.L. teams take a break, some of their affiliates will play in the parent arenas, offering players a taste of the big time and fans a chance to see young talent.
